name: Get Flickr Thumbnails
author: Zhihong

sections.description:
Version 0.91 update:It works for non flickr.com images,have fun!
Get Flickr Thumbnails plugin can get thumbnails for photos on your site that from flickr.com,you can choose recent or random mode,and it will link to your own post.
sections.installation:
You can learn it from screen shoot.
1. Upload the folder advanced-post-image to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Edit $image_number = ?(defaut is 6,edit it if you want) $type = “?”(defaut is “random” you can alse use “recent”) in flickrtimage.php line 25.
Edit print ‘ h3 ? /h3 ‘ in line 16,defaut is Random Models,edit a new title fit for your blog.
3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
4. a:If your WP suport widgets,add “Random Flickr Images” in a right place.
b:Place in your templates.
